awd_titl_txt: Computer Support for Real-time Programming Instruction
awd_abstract_narration: This project supports enhancement of this institution's computer           science course in real-time and system level software development.              Undergraduate students are exposed to a laboratory having dedicated             machines (so that system level errors during software development do            not disrupt other users) and high-level software development support            and modern interfacing equipment so that practical projects can be              carried out in the lab. The equipment supporting this lab includes;             VME-bus based microcomputers with serial and parallel ports, floppy             disk controller and drive and interrupt capabilities; debug monitor;            and, cross-assembler.                                                                                                                                                This award is being matched by an equal sum from the grantee.
